name: Gun, Disposable, Man Portable, Improved (ImDGMP-10)
description: An improved, disposable, man-portable gun. This version is constructed of relatively inexpensive materials and has a working lifetime measured in days.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
